attributes.action: stop the number10.gov.uk website from rejecting petitions that are in the public interest.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Have a look on the rejected petitions section of this site and there are hundreds of rejected petitions that are genuinely in the public interest. However it seems they are rejected based upon the fact that the government, due to the shambolic way it runs the country, has no response and would rather ignore them. So much for a democratic society!!

rejection.details: The criteria for e-petitions we cannot accept are displayed on the terms and conditions page.  Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
